channel.title: Comments on: Fourth Year of the Blog
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: zjb
item.dc:creator: zjb
item.description: Reblogged this on <a href="http://jewishphilosophyplace.wordpress.com/2013/09/29/fourth-year-of-the-blog/" rel="nofollow">jewish philosophy place</a> and commented: My older brother on the blogosphere, Alan Brill's blog was my first realization of what you can do online. He tends to go deep, whereas I try to stay on the surface.
item.content:encoded:
Reblogged this on jewish philosophy place and commented:
My older brother on the blogosphere, Alan Brill’s blog was my first realization of what you can do online. He tends to go deep, whereas I try to stay on the surface.
